PcDocRulesExpr.LValue: QuoteDtl.WarrantyCode = Inputs.chk_overridewarranty.Value == true && Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value != "" ? Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value : Inputs.chr_warranty.Value;
OrderDtl.WarrantyCode = Inputs.chk_overridewarranty.Value == true && Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value != "" ? Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value : Inputs.chr_warranty.Value;

PcDynLst.Condition:
return Inputs.rad_insertsupplytype.Value == "2" && Inputs.var_mfgartworklookup.Value != "";
// rad_insertsupplytype = "2" and var_mfgartworklookup <>""

return Inputs.rad_insertsupplytype.Value == "1" && Inputs.var_inserttyperange.Value == "r2";
// rad_insertsupplytype = "1" and var_inserttyperange = "r2"

return Inputs.rad_insertsupplytype.Value == "2" && Inputs.var_inserttyperange.Value == "r2";
// rad_insertsupplytype = "2" and var_inserttyperange = "r2"

return Inputs.rad_insertsupplytype.Value == "1" && Inputs.var_inserttyperange.Value == "r1";
// rad_insertsupplytype = "1" and var_inserttyperange = "r1"

PcInputs.SideLabel: Warning - Selecting this check box will clear all entries:
PcInputs.SummaryLabel: Warning - Selecting this check box will clear all entries:

PcInputs.SideLabel: Access to all available Part record finish options
Specifying a Pallet type will auto populate the Pack/Job Comment.
Note. Select a Pallet type first then add additional comments (if required)

PcInputsExpr.Expression: return !(Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "1" && (Inputs.cmb_mfgframesize.Value == "" || Inputs.cmb_mfgorientation.Value == "" || Inputs.cmb_mfgweight.Value == "") ? false : Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "2" && (Inputs.cmb_mfgframesize.Value == "" || Inputs.cmb_mfgthickness.Value == "" || Inputs.cmb_mfginsertorientation.Value == "" || Inputs.cmb_mfgface.Value == "") ? false : Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "3" && (Inputs.cmb_mfgframesize.Value == "" || Inputs.cmb_mfgorientation.Value == "" || Inputs.cmb_mfgweight.Value == "" || Inputs.cmb_mfgthickness.Value == "" || Inputs.cmb_mfginsertorientation.Value == "" || Inputs.cmb_mfgface.Value == "") ? false : Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "4" ? true : Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "" ? false : true);
return !((Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "2" || Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "3") && Inputs.chk_confirmparams.Value == false ? true : false);
return !((Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "1" || Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "2" || Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "3") && Inputs.chk_confirmparams.Value == false ? true : false);
return !((Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "2" || Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "3") && Inputs.chk_confirmparams.Value == false ? true : false);
return !((Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "1" || Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "3") && Inputs.chk_confirmparams.Value == false ? true : false);
return !((Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "2" || Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "3") && Inputs.chk_confirmparams.Value == false ? true : false);
return !((Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "1" || Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "3") && Inputs.chk_confirmparams.Value == false ? true : false);

return !(Inputs.chk_confirmparams.Value == true && Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "4" && Inputs.cmb_mfgtype.Value != "" ? true : Inputs.chk_confirmparams.Value == true && Inputs.cmb_mfgframepart.Value == "" && (Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "1" || Inputs.rad_configuration.Value == "3") ? true : false);

// /* Upcharge Calc Total */ Inputs.var_upchargecalctotal.Value = Inputs.var_seg1upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg2upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg3upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg4upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg5upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg6upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg7upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg8upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg9upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg10upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg11upcharge.Value + Inputs.var_seg12upcharge.Value;
